item.title: Random?
item.dc:creator: @wwe4eva wwe4eva
item.description:
@wwe4eva wrote:

Using this tutorial: http://www.r-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/328304-pi-auto-donation-system-items-new.html

if($ip == “66.211.170.66” && $ip == “216.113.188.202” && $ip == “216.113.188.203” && $ip == “216.113.188.202”) {
print “Scammer…”;
$hak = fopen(“scammer.log”, “a”);
fwrite($hak, “$ip \r\n”);
fclose($hak);
die(0);

Surely that means if your IP isn’t one of those above, it lists you as a Scammer?

Also.

$mysql_host = ‘localhost’; //Leave at localhost
$mysql_user = ‘root’; //DB User
$mysql_pass = ‘snowyr’; //DB Pass
$mysql_db = ‘status’; //DB Name
$file = ‘paypal.log’; //Paypal Log Name will be placed in the same location as your ipn.php file

Is the host supposed to be localhost? Because my friend tried buying something from the site, but I never got the item. I’m really confused.

Any-one care to help?

Read full topic
